Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by falsely identifying the speaker in the video as "the new congresswoman from Michigan."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or proof to support the identification of the speaker.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the speaker in the video is not the new congresswoman from Michigan, but rather a Muslim scholar who passed away in 2004.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the video represents the beliefs of the new congresswoman from Michigan, even though it does not show her or any other member of Congress.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation, such as a deliberate attempt to spread misinformation or create controversy.
